channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: OpenAIとマイクロソフトに対するニューヨーク・タイムズの裁判に、以前の著作権裁判とフェアユース裁判がどのように影響するかについて、法律の専門家はさまざまな意見を述べている（Washington Post）。
item.description:
Washington Post:
Legal experts offer mixed opinions about how earlier copyright and fair use cases could affect The New York Times' case against OpenAI and Microsoft  —  A lawsuit accuses OpenAI and Microsoft of violating the New York Times's copyright.  But the law is anything but clear.

item.title: 2023年に自身のYouTube番組をESPNで放送する高額契約を結んだパット・マカフィーが、ESPNトップのノービー・ウィリアムソンが自身の番組を「妨害」していると非難（Sharon Knolle/The Wrap）
item.description:
Sharon Knolle / The Wrap:
Pat McAfee, who signed a lucrative deal in 2023 for his YouTube show to air on ESPN, accuses top ESPN executive Norby Williamson of “sabotaging” his program  —  The former NFL punter accuses Norby Williamson of leaking inaccurate ratings information  —  Video

item.title: 1994年から2001年までニューヨーク・タイムズ紙の編集長を務め、ピューリッツァー賞を受賞したジョセフ・リーヴェルドがパーキンソン病の合併症により86歳で死去。
item.description:
Robert D. McFadden / New York Times:
Joseph Lelyveld, The New York Times executive editor from 1994 to 2001 and Pulitzer Prize winner, dies at 86 from complications of Parkinson's disease  —  As executive editor from 1994 to 2001, he oversaw a period of growth, expanding national and international readerships …

item.title: ユニバーサルは、24作品を公開し49.1億ドルを稼ぎ出し、2016年から首位だったディズニーを退け、2023年の世界興行収入で最大のシェアを獲得した（Scott Roxborough/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Scott Roxborough / The Hollywood Reporter:
Universal had the largest share of 2023's global box office, after releasing 24 films that made $4.91B, dethroning Disney, which had the top spot since 2016  —  Box office jumped more than 8 percent to $1.35 billion but remained well below pre-COVID levels.  —  Thank you Barbenheimer.

item.title: WBDのマックス、ブリーチャー・リポートのスポーツ・ティアの有料化計画を「あと数ヶ月」延期、当初の開始日は2024年2月末（Dade Hayes/Deadline）
item.description:
Dade Hayes / Deadline:
WBD's Max delays plans to start charging for its Bleacher Report sports tier “for a few more months”; the original start date was the end of February 2024  —  EXCLUSIVE: Warner Bros. Discovery plans to launch the paid version of its B/R Sports Add-On several months from now, a shift from the company's initial guidance.

item.title: 分析：英国で完全に認められた情報公開請求の割合は2013年の55％から2022年には29％に減少、2023年第2四半期には公的機関が34％の情報公開請求を認めた（Andrew Kersley/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Andrew Kersley / Press Gazette:
Analysis: the percentage of fully granted FOI requests in the UK fell from 55% in 2013 to 29% in 2022; in Q2 2023, public bodies granted 34% of FOI requests  —  Journalists are increasingly frustrated by failures in government compliance with the Freedom of Information Act.

item.title: コムスコア英国・アイルランドの興行収入は2023年に前年比8.3％増の£1.06Bとなり、2019年以来初めて£1Bを超える；2015～2019年の興行収入は£1.3B+/年（Naman Ramachandran/Variety）
item.description:
Naman Ramachandran / Variety:
Comscore: UK and Ireland box office revenue rose 8.3% YoY to £1.06B in 2023, the first time it crossed £1B since 2019; box office from 2015-2019 was £1.3B+/year  —  The U.K. and Ireland box office revenue improved 8.3% from £980.5 million ($1.25 billion) …

item.title: 2023年、WHYYがスタンドアップコメディアンとしてのジョークを理由に記者を解雇した後、仲裁人は彼を復職させなければならないが、ソーシャルメディアからジョークを削除しなければならないという裁定を下した（Jules Roscoe/VICE）
item.description:
Jules Roscoe / VICE:
After WHYY fired a reporter in 2023 for jokes he made as a stand-up comedian, an arbitrator ruled he must be reinstated but delete his jokes from social media  —  Jad Sleiman was a reporter in Philadelphia before he was fired over his budding comedy career.  Now, his employer has been ordered to reinstate him.

item.title: ニールセン：2023年に最も視聴されたテレビ放送100のうち、NFLは93を占め、2022年の82から増加、サッカー以外の放送でトップ50に入ったのはSOTUとメイシーズ・パレードのみ（Anthony Crupi/Sportico）
item.description:
Anthony Crupi / Sportico:
Nielsen: NFL made up 93 of 2023's 100 most-watched TV broadcasts, up from 82 in 2022; SOTU and Macy's Parade were the only non-football broadcasts in the top 50  —  The actor's glum endorsement of the generic—he looked like a referee who'd been going through a bad divorce …

item.title: 米証券取引委員会（SEC）は、ディズニーの次回の株主総会で、ディズニーのAI利用に関する透明性報告書の提案に対する投票を行わなければならないと規定した（Alex Weprin/The Hollywood Reporter
item.description:
Alex Weprin / The Hollywood Reporter:
The SEC rules that Disney must have a vote on a proposal for a transparency report on Disney's use of AI at its next shareholder meeting  —  The AFL-CIO is pushing for Disney and Apple to explain how they use artificial intelligence.  —  The Walt Disney Co. won't just have a potential proxy fight …

item.title: Puckが新CEOに元Twitter幹部のサラ・ペルソネット氏を指名、情報源：創刊2年の同誌の有料会員数は4万人、2023年の売上は1000万ドル以上（Alexandra Bruell/Wall Street Journal）
item.description:
Alexandra Bruell / Wall Street Journal:
Puck names ex-Twitter executive Sarah Personette as its new CEO; source: the two-year-old publication has 40K paying subscribers and $10M+ in revenue in 2023  —  Sarah Personette will be tasked with helping company expand into new coverage areas and markets

item.title: 情報源Netflixは、IAPや広告など、ビデオゲームから収益を上げる方法を検討中、Apptopia：2023年10月時点で、同社のゲームを毎日プレイする加入者は1％未満（Jessica Toonkel/Wall Street Journal）。
item.description:
Jessica Toonkel / Wall Street Journal:
Sources: Netflix is weighing how to make money from video games, like via IAPs and ads; Apptopia: as of October 2023, <1% of subscribers played its games daily  —  Ideas include charging extra for some games and incorporating ads, in-game purchases  —  Netflix has said it plans to be in gaming for years to come.

item.title: 分析：2023年、英国、米国、カナダのメディアは少なくとも7,900人の雇用を削減し、新規ポジションの発表は361件にとどまる（Press Gazette）。
item.description:
Press Gazette:
Analysis: in 2023, media outlets in the UK, the US, and Canada cut at least 7,900 jobs and only made 361 announcements for new positions  —  Biggest headcount losses proposed at BCE Inc and CBC in Canada, as well as News Corp and Reach.  —  More than 7,900 journalism industry job cuts throughout 2023 …

item.title: 2023年の世界興行収入は339億ドルに達し、2022年比30.5％増だが、2017～2019年平均を15％下回る；中国は前年比83％増の～77億ドル（Nancy Tartaglione／Deadline）
item.description:
Nancy Tartaglione / Deadline:
Gower Street estimates the global box office reached $33.9B in 2023, up 30.5% on 2022 but 15% below the 2017-2019 average; China rose 83% YoY to ~$7.7B in 2023  —  Global box office is estimated to have reached $33.9B for 2023, a 30.5% gain on 2022, according to Gower Street Analytics.

item.title: SubstackはCloudflareのような純粋なインフラ・プロバイダーとして見られたいが、Substackはコンテンツを推奨しながら単純なインフラであるとは主張できない（Casey Newton/Platformer）
item.description:
Casey Newton / Platformer:
Substack wants to be seen as a pure infrastructure provider, akin to Cloudflare, but Substack can't claim to be simple infrastructure while recommending content  —  Some thoughts on platforms and Nazis  —  Most days, this column looks at controversies unfolding on other tech platforms.
